# Imagem no Bot√£o

```html
<div class="container">
  <button>
    <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="">
    <p>Picture</p>
  </button>
</div>
```

```css
.container{
  display:flex;
}

button{
  display:flex;
  align-items:center;
  gap: .4rem;
}

button img{
  display:cover;
  width: 2rem;
  height:2rem;
}
```
